Bug Description: The topics ''point_class", "line_class", and "vector_class" got renamed to "line", "point", and "vector" in the publisher "vector_map_loader" but not the subscribers "feat_proj", "lane_rule", and "velocity_set"
Rule: There is no topic with only subscribers that has the same type as a topic with only publishers
Bug Duration: Was on a feature branch (did not merge into master before the fix)
